item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Fully documented source code for Lander on the Acorn Archimedes (49 points | 7 comments)

10. Show HN: An expression parser supporting multiple types (4 points | discuss)
11. I designed a Dieter Rams-inspired iPhone dock (1333 points | 303 comments)
12. We fine-tuned Llama 405B on AMD GPUs (364 points | 71 comments)
13. Free-form floor plan design using differentiable Voronoi diagram (207 points | 40 comments)

21. Perfect prevention vs. perfect detection (47 points | 6 comments)
22. Active Ball Joint Mechanism with Three-DoF Based on Spherical Gear Meshings (18 points | 8 comments)

24. A terrible way to jump into colocating your own stuff (207 points | 135 comments)
25. Excel spreadsheet caused network equipment's physical failure (21 points | 13 comments)
26. A Web-based WYSIWYG editor for automation routines (20 points | 6 comments)
27. Alan Turing's 1950 manual for the Mark I electronic computer [pdf] (210 points | 53 comments)

29. Brainfuck Enterprise Solutions (551 points | 138 comments)
